title: ‘Mercy’ Stars Chris Pratt And Rebecca Ferguson On The Dangers Of AI
description: Hollywood stars Rebecca Ferguson and Chris Pratt discuss their new "Mercy" action movie, as well as reveal their thoughts surrounding artificial intelligence.
content:
In a world where Artificial Intelligence (AI) continues to make a growing impact on our everyday lives, for better or worse, one movie in theaters now is highlighting the advancing technology in a most thought-provoking and entertaining way.

title: PwC launches AI framework to unlock $550 billion in five sectors
description: PwC India launched an AI framework at Davos, saying artificial intelligence could add $550 billion to India’s economy by 2035. The plan focuses on agriculture, education, energy, healthcare and manufacturing to drive inclusive growth. Leaders said strong governance, skills and infrastructure are key to making AI people-centric.
content:

title: CEOs Leave Davos Warning Europe to Shape Up or Lose to US, China
description: Whether it’s in pharmaceuticals, artificial intelligence, or defense, executives attending the World Economic Forum in Davos this week had a stark warning for Europe: Get your house in order or lose out to the US and China.

title: 'Jobs, jobs, jobs' the AI mantra as fears take back seat in Davos
description: DAVOS, Switzerland, Jan 23 (Reuters) - Biting cold, political tensions and doubts ‌about artificial intelligence did nothing to curb the enthusiasm of business leaders in Davos over technology's ability to create jobs.

title: 95% of faculty think AI making students overly reliant on technology for learning: survey
description: A new survey from the American Association of Colleges and Universities and Elon University’s Imagining the Digital Future Center found that an overwhelming majority of college faculty are concerned that artificial intelligence is harming students’ critical thinking abilities.

title: Oregon among top 10 states with the highest AI usage, report says
description: A study that monitors the use of artificial intelligence in the U.S. found that Oregon is among the top states with the highest AI use in the country.
content:
Oregon is among the top 10 states with the highest AI use in the country, according to a study that monitors the use of artificial intelligence tools throughout the U.S.
